vpns.name: NordVPN
pros: Strong security features including double VPN
Works great with Netflix and torrenting
Threat Protection blocks ads and malware
cons: Desktop app can be slow to connect
vpns.description: NordVPN offers premium features at mid-tier pricing. With over 6,300 servers and advanced features like Double VPN and Onion over VPN, it's perfect for privacy-conscious users who don't want to overspend.

vpns.name: Surfshark
pros: Works with all major streaming platforms
cons: Speeds can vary on congested servers
vpns.description: Surfshark punches way above its weight class. With unlimited device connections and a price point under $2.50/month, it's perfect for families or users with multiple devices who refuse to compromise on security.

vpns.name: CyberGhost
vpns.description: CyberGhost's one-click interface makes it the most beginner-friendly VPN on the market. With specialized servers for streaming and torrenting, plus the longest money-back guarantee at 45 days, it's risk-free for new users.

vpns.name: Private Internet Access
cons: Based in the US (5 Eyes country)
vpns.description: PIA has proven its no-logs policy in court multiple times. With open-source apps, port forwarding, and unlimited devices, it's the gold standard for privacy purists and power users who want maximum control.
